full_summary:
Maintenance Dredging at Cap-aux-Meules
=====================================

**Solicitation Number:** EE517-230684/B
**Reference Number:** PW-_QCM-042-18361

**Tender Closing Date:** Tuesday, October 25th, 2022, at 2:00 p.m.

**Description of Work**
-------------------------

The tender involved maintenance dredging at Cap-aux-Meules harbour and the access channel leading to it.

**Trade Agreement**
-------------------

This solicitation is covered by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Tendering Procedure**
-------------------------

Interested suppliers may submit a bid according to the competitive procurement strategy.

**Mandatory Criteria**
-----------------------

By the time of bid closing, the bidders must complete the Unit Price Form and provide the following information:

* Description of dredge(s) and dump scows
* Experience of the superintendent
* Positioning system description

Additionally, the bidders must provide a complete list of directors and provide properly completed and signed Consent Forms for any or all of the said directors. Failure to comply with these requirements will render the bid non-responsive.

**Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement**
--------------------------------------

There are no comprehensive land claim agreements related to this project.

**Period of Work**
------------------

The contractor must complete the work within the periods indicated in the specifications.

**Contact Information**
-----------------------

For any inquiries, please contact Gabriel Fortin-Harvey, Procurement Officer, at Gabriel.Fortin-Harvey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Obtaining Tender Documents**
------------------------------

Firms intending to submit a proposal should obtain tender documents from the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) on canadabuys.canada.ca. All addenda will be issued on the same platform.

**Bid Submission**
-----------------

Bidders must submit their bids electronically through the Canada Post Corporation (CPC) Connect service. There will be no public opening of the bids.

**Language**
--------------

The procurement office provides acquisition services to the public in both official languages of Canada.

Note: A total of 400-words will contain all relevant information in proper English format. Ensure to keep all the mandatory elements with proper official language choices where required.
